description:
• Enhanced data management by migrating local MySQL databases to AWS, reducing data retrieval times to 300 ms and cutting operational costs by 20%. 
 • Optimized real-time data visualization and monitoring using Grafana and Splunk, achieving a 30% improvement in system response times. 
 • Streamlined backend workflows with Jenkins-driven CI/CD pipelines, ensuring seamless transitions of Python scripts during data migration efforts.

• Collaborated on innovative solutions for inverse problems in computational imaging, improving techniques like inpainting and denoising. 
 • Developed machine learning models for medical diagnostics, enhancing image evaluation processes by 30% and boosting diagnostic accuracy. 
 • Created iCare, an Android application for early detection of glaucoma, leading the project from conception through to securing investment..

• Researched and applied advanced non-convex optimization techniques for image reconstruction, enhancing the denoising of brain MR images. 
 • Innovated a sparse coding algorithm for dictionary learning, achieving a significant improvement in image quality as measured by a 1.36 dB increase in PSNR.

• Developed and optimized an Android application for real estate management, integrating RESTful APIs for improved data communication. 
 • Enhanced application performance, achieving a 25% increase in processing speed and a 20% reduction in memory usage through effective 
 JSON parsing optimizations.
